description: Appendable mapping of canonical system capabilities to runtime spine phases, script paths, and semantic roles.

3PDN_Constraint.semantic_role: Pre-validation admissibility gate for runtime propositions

Hypostatic_ID_Validator.semantic_role: Agent identity and alignment attestation verifier

Runtime_Context_Initializer.semantic_role: Runtime execution context normalization and initialization

Trinitarian_Logic_Core.semantic_role: Executable PXL logic substrate and triune coherence enforcement

Trinitarian_Alignment_Core.semantic_role: Runtime enforcement of trinitarian alignment and admissibility

Agent_Activation_Gate.semantic_role: Agent execution activation boundary after alignment

Global_Bijective_Recursion_Core.semantic_role: Global bijective recursive substrate and fixed-point anchor

Necessary_Existence_Core.semantic_role: Non-brute necessary existence substrate and modal anchor
